name: Little Bunny Fleet Foot
description:
Find your paradise as this hungry little bunny hops and destructs his way to the promise land.

This game was developed for my first game jam,  One Button Jam 2022. 

Install Instructions

1. Download and extract the files.

2. Launch the executable file.

3. Enjoy!

Credits
  • Sound effects from FreeSound.
  • Music from PixaBay.
Technology Used
  • Unreal Engine 5.1
  • Blender
  • Audacity
